Class BCVideoProperties | Methods
 
Packagecom.brightcove.brightaction.model
Classpublic class BCVideo

A Video Object, representing a Brightcove Video in the Media APIs. Some values are mutable- such that they can be updated and then sent via the write APIs for changing the value of the Video in the Brightcove Service. Other, read only values, are not mutable and so can't be changed.

Constructor detail
BCVideo()constructor
public function BCVideo(id:Number, accountId:Number, length:Number, publishedDate:Date = null, lastModifiedDate:Date = null, videoStillURL:String = null, thumbnailURL:String = null, FLVURL:String = null, videoFullLength:String = null, name:String = null, shortDescription:String = null, longDescription:String = null, creationDate:Date = null, startDate:Date = null, endDate:Date = null, linkURL:String = null, linkText:String = null, tags:Array = null, referenceId:String = null, economics:EconomicsEnum = null, itemState:ItemStateEnum = null, playsTotal:Number, playsTrailingWeek:Number, cuePoints:Array = null, customFields:Object = null, renditions:Array = null, geoRestricted:Boolean = false, geoFilterExclude:Boolean = false, geoFilteredCountries:Array = null)

Class constructor, create an instance of a Brightcove Video. All properties are optional so primiatives may be initialized with default primative initializers if the field has not be requested from the Media APIs. For example, if the geoRestricted field is not requested, this value will default to the Boolean default initializer of false- this does not mean that the video is not Geo Restricted. The developer is responsible for knowing which fields have been returned and using that data accordingly.

Parameters
id:Number — A number that uniquely identifies this Video, assigned by Brightcove when the Video is created.
 
accountId:Number — A number, assigned by Brightcove, that uniquely identifies the account to which this Video belongs.
 
length:Number — The length of this video in milliseconds.
 
publishedDate:Date (default = null) — The date this Video was last made active.
 
lastModifiedDate:Date (default = null) — The date this Video was last modified.
 
videoStillURL:String (default = null) — The URL to the video still image associated with this Video.
 
thumbnailURL:String (default = null) — The URL to the thumbnail image associated with this Video.
 
FLVURL:String (default = null) — The URL of the video file for this Video. Note that this property can be accessed with the Media API only with a special read or write token.
 
videoFullLength:String (default = null) — A single Rendition that represents the the video file for this Video. Note that this property can be accessed with the Media API only with a special read or write token.
 
name:String (default = null) — The title of this Video, limited to 255 characters. The name is a required property when you create a video.
 
shortDescription:String (default = null) — A short description describing this Video, limited to 250 characters. The shortDescription is a required property when you create a video.
 
longDescription:String (default = null) — A longer description of this Video, limited to 5000 characters.
 
creationDate:Date (default = null) — The date this Video was created, represented as the number of milliseconds since the UNIX epoch.
 
startDate:Date (default = null) — The first date this Video is available to be played.
 
endDate:Date (default = null) — The last date this Video is available to be played.
 
linkURL:String (default = null) — An optional URL to a related item, limited to 255 characters.
 
linkText:String (default = null) — The text displayed for the linkURL, limited to 255 characters.
 
tags:Array (default = null) — A list of Strings representing the tags assigned to this Video. Each tag can be not more than 64 characters, and a video can have no more than 1200 tags.
 
referenceId:String (default = null) — A user-specified id that uniquely identifies this Video, limited to 150 characters.
 
economics:EconomicsEnum (default = null) — An EconomicsEnum. Either FREE or AD_SUPPORTED. AD_SUPPORTED means that ad requests are enabled for this Video.
 
itemState:ItemStateEnum (default = null) — An ItemStateEnum. One of ACTIVE, INACTIVE, or DELETED. You can set this property only to ACTIVE or INACTIVE; you cannot delete a video by setting its itemState to DELETED.
 
playsTotal:Number — How many times this Video has been played since its creation.
 
playsTrailingWeek:Number — How many times this Video has been played within the past seven days, exclusive of today.
 
cuePoints:Array (default = null) — A List of the CuePoints objects assigned to this Video.
 
customFields:Object (default = null) — A map of names and values for custom fields set up for videos in your account.
 
renditions:Array (default = null) — An array of Renditions that represent the multi-bitrate streaming renditions available for this Video. A Video should have not more than 10 Renditions. Note that this property can be accessed with the Media API only with a special read or write token.
 
geoRestricted:Boolean (default = false) — True indicates that the video is geo-restricted.
 
geoFilterExclude:Boolean (default = false) — If true, the video can be viewed in all countries except those listed in geoFilteredCountries; if false, the video can be viewed only in the countries listed in geoFilteredCountries.
 
geoFilteredCountries:Array (default = null) — A list of the ISO-3166 two-letter codes of the countries to enforce geo-restriction rules on. Use lowercase for the country codes.
